nickel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a hard silver-white metal that is often combined with other metals, for example to make steel. It is a chemical element: symbol Ni
nickel.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a coin in the US or Canada that is worth five cents
nickel.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a coin in the US or Canada that is worth five cents
nickel.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Gasoline rose more than a nickel a gallon.
nickel.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a hard silver-white metal used in manufacturing and traded on COMMODITY MARKETs
nickel.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Nickel rose nearly as strongly as zinc on the London Metal Exchange yesterday.
